content.value:
Aurora Hostel is located in Quinta Camacho, the old part of Chapinero, where you can still find original houses. The neighborhood is quiet and safe and you can generally go out, even at night, without any problems. There are a lot of excellent restaurants close to our hostel as well as Zona G where the best restaurants of Bogota are located. Zona T, where you will find all the clubs and bars, is just 15 blocks from us and you can walk there in 15 - 20 mins. There is a big shopping centre incl. cinema, theatres, the art district and a lot of other things in the area.

The shared dorms have large, comfortable beds with curtains; so that you have privacy, even in a dorm. Each bed has its own locker to store your baggage safely. The private rooms have large double beds, one with shared bathroom, the other one with private bathroom and vertical garden.

We follow a policy of sustainability, that’s why our day to day work is oriented towards the saving of energy and resources, the use and promotion of local products, and the preservation of the environment;  always trying to satisfy the needs of our clients in a positive and efficient way.

description.description: At Aurora Hostel there is space for 18 travellers so it is quite homely. We want to offer you a relaxed place where you can feel at home. As we love nature, we have a lot of plants and wood in the house which has an old style interior. This makes for a comfortable atmosphere.
